${modID}:CasterCombo.NAME: Caster's Combo
${modID}:CasterCombo.DESCRIPTION: When you deal damage 3 times in a row without taking any, NL add an Extra Turn to your hand.

${modID}:ExtraTurn.NAME: Extra Turn
${modID}:ExtraTurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Restore !manaGain! ${modID}:MP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlameFan.NAME: Flame Fan
${modID}:FlameFan.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Curse_Art. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Costs !manaCost! ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:ArtsBoost.NAME: Arts Boost
${modID}:ArtsBoost.DESCRIPTION: Boosts the damage and Block of your ${modID}:Curse_Arts.

${modID}:ArtsDeboost.NAME: Arts Deboost
${modID}:ArtsDeboost.DESCRIPTION: Reduces the damage and Block of your ${modID}:Curse_Arts.

${modID}:VoidCleft.NAME: Curse: Void Cleft
${modID}:VoidCleft.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Curse_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Scales !M! times with ${modID}:Arts_Boost. NL Costs !manaCost! ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:Break.NAME: Break
${modID}:Break.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:AphoticCave.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Curse_Art. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Restore ${modID}:MP equal to damage blocked this turn. NL Costs !manaCost! ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:ZeroOrigin.NAME: Zero Origin
${modID}:ZeroOrigin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Arts_Boost. NL Lose 20% of your Total HP at the start of each turn. NL Heal it all back at the end of combat.

${modID}:SecretGarden.NAME: Caster's Secret Garden
${modID}:SecretGarden.DESCRIPTION: Receive !M! Vulnerable. NL Uncap your Maximum ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:FrigidStorm.NAME: Frigid Storm
${modID}:FrigidStorm.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Curse_Art. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Costs !manaCost! ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:FieryBurst.NAME: Fiery Burst

${modID}:ChaoticWind.NAME: Chaotic Wind
${modID}:ChaoticWind.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Curse_Art. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times. NL Costs !manaCost! ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:TheFieldsOfNasu.NAME: The Fields of Nasu
${modID}:TheFieldsOfNasu.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, Exhaust it and gain 1 ${modID}:Arts_Boost.

${modID}:CurseMaster.NAME: Curse Master
${modID}:CurseMaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse card, draw 1 card and restore 1 ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:AmaterasuDisdain.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cannot be removed from your deck. NL At the end of your turn, lose 2 ${modID}:MP.

${modID}:SpiritTheft.NAME: Spirit Theft

${modID}:BreathOfTheSoul.NAME: Breath of the Soul
${modID}:BreathOfTheSoul.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, restore !M! ${modID}:MP.
